description: This file defines a Flask route for health checking, utilizing Flask-Smorest's Blueprint and MethodView to create an endpoint that returns a health status message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A view class that handles GET requests for the health check endpoint

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check route, returning a JSON message indicating the system is healthy

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
